A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was absolutely the worst Star Wars movie ever made\, I have been a fan for 40 years now and this movie seems to want to destroy everything we loved. TBH this movie made the Force Awakens kinda irrelevant\, all the hype and build up in that movie was literally thrown over the shoulder and characters we thought would be central became completely worrhless. Lots of attempts at some cheap laughs a little SJW theme and some real bad subplots made this movie terrible. Not sure how this franchise will redeem itself with half it's audience alienated bravo Rian Johnson bravo.
